lead_paragraph: If the Kansas City Chiefs believe in karma or coincidence or some sort of cosmic alignment, then they should be confident their 22-year drought without a playoff victory will soon come to an end.

headline.print_headline: Chiefs Face Texans Looking for 1st Playoff Win in 22 Years
headline.main: Chiefs Face Texans Looking for 1st Playoff Win in 22 Years
